remarks: A section in the category of non-unital rings, written out. (Contributed by AV, 28-Feb-2020.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
rngcsectOLD.c $e |- C = ( RngCatOLD ` U ) $.
rngcsectOLD.b $e |- B = ( Base ` C ) $.
rngcsectOLD.u $e |- ( ph -> U e. V ) $.
rngcsectOLD.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. B ) $.
rngcsectOLD.y $e |- ( ph -> Y e. B ) $.
rngcsectOLD.e $e |- E = ( Base ` X ) $.
rngcsectOLD.n $e |- S = ( Sect ` C ) $.
rngcsectOLD $p |- ( ph -> ( F ( X S Y ) G <-> ( F e. ( X RngHomo Y ) /\ G e. ( Y RngHomo X ) /\ ( G o. F ) = ( _I |` E ) ) ) ) $.
